innovation.description: First system to convert pure natural language directly to production-ready KiCad schematics without manual intervention
Shows formula derivations and reasoning for every component value, making AI decisions transparent
Custom domain-specific language for intermediate circuit representation ensuring validation and consistency

technical_complexity.details: NLP → DSL → Validation → SKiDL → KiCad (5-stage transformation pipeline)
Implements electrical formulas (RC filters, voltage dividers) with E12/E24 series standard value selection
Graph-based validation ensuring no floating nodes, valid component values, and proper net connectivity

design_ux.user_benefit: Reduces 30+ minute manual design to <5 seconds
design_ux.implementation: Single text input with intelligent parsing and immediate schematic generation

design_ux.user_benefit: No EDA tool knowledge required - describe circuits in plain English
design_ux.implementation: LLM-powered intent extraction with context-aware parsing

design_ux.user_benefit: Educational value - users learn why values were chosen
design_ux.implementation: Formula-based explanation generation with step-by-step reasoning
